#BlackMagicCraft #Episode124

In this episode I assemble and paint a Reaper Bones Shipwreck Revenant. I utilize a lot of cool custom details like seaweed, green object source lighting, and a custom diorama style resin water base with wave effects. 

REFRENCED VIDEOS
